data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Almora access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Almora, Uttarakhand, India

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Almora, Uttarakhand, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Almora who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, defend the church in the county of Almora against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kathputli Nachanewala people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Almora, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 6,848 believers in Almora against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Almora, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

location.name: Almora
location.people_groups_list: Valmiki (Balmiki) Chuhra, Jat Deswal, Ansari, Faqir, Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Valmiki (Balmiki) Chuhra (595,000), Jat Deswal (74,000), Ansari (10,555,000), Faqir (90,000), Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions) (1,800)
